name: Ch20ABaseConvo4
_source: speak;Colm;Hey Rennac!|Still haven't returned that gold bracelet to the merchant in Renais, huh?
speak;Rennac;Why would I?|That self-important fool was charging triple its worth.|And what about you?|Still wearing that nobleman's silk handkerchief you swiped in Frelia?
speak;Colm;Hey, it's good quality!|Besides, you're the one who showed me how to spot the real silk from the fake stuff.
speak;Rennac;One of my many talents I've generously shared with you.|So, what did you manage to "acquire" on our last excursion?
speak;Colm;Nothing too fancy.|Just a few gold pieces and a silver brooch.|But I did it without anyone noticing, unlike someone who knocked over that vase in Serafew.
speak;Rennac;That was one time!|And if you recall, I still managed to escape with the merchant's lockbox.
speak;Colm;True.|You've got nimble fingers for an old-timer.
speak;Rennac;Speaking of nimble fingers...|I've been saving this particular acquisition for a special occasion.
speak;Colm;Oh?|What did you manage to snag this time?
speak;Colm;No way!|That's a demon sword!|I thought that there was only one of those!|Are you sure it's real?
speak;Rennac;Very real, I assure you.|Notice how the blade seems to drink in the light around it?
speak;Colm;That's incredible!|This makes my heist from the Grado military storehouse look like child's play.|How did you even find it?|Last I heard, it was locked in some impenetrable vault.
speak;Rennac;Let's just say those Grado guards aren't as vigilant at dawn as they claim to be.|Especially after someone spikes their evening meal with sleeping herbs.
speak;Colm;You didn't!|Even I wouldn't have the guts to steal from Grado's elites!
speak;Rennac;Yes, well...|I may have slightly miscalculated the... repercussions.|There are now three villages in Grado where my face is posted at every inn.
speak;Colm;Only three?|That's actually better than your usual record.|Remember that incident with the duchess's necklace?
speak;Rennac;Don't remind me.|But this is different.|The head priest actually put a curse on whoever stole it.
speak;Colm;A curse?|Is that why you've been looking over your shoulder more than usual?
speak;Rennac;I've been thinking...|We've stolen from merchants, nobles, even military supplies.|But sacred relics?|Are we just common criminals now?
speak;Colm;I've been wondering the same thing lately.|Neimi keeps asking where all my "gifts" come from.|I'm running out of excuses.
speak;Rennac;It used to be about surviving.|Then it became about skill.|Now I'm stealing cursed daggers from temples and I don't even know why.
speak;Colm;Maybe we should return some of this stuff.|Starting with that dagger before it turns your hair white or something.
speak;Rennac;sighs|Perhaps you're right.|Though I doubt the priests will welcome me with open arms.
speak;Colm;We could always leave it on their altar in the dead of night.|We're good at that part, at least.
speak;Rennac;Look at us.|The great thieves of Magvel, talking about returning stolen goods.|What's next?|Honest work?
speak;Colm;Let's not get carried away.|Maybe just... steal from people who deserve it?
speak;Rennac;Now that's a compromise I can live with.
